ABOUT-ME.CONTENT: As a frontend developer based in Hamburg, Germany, I help designers and companies bring their ideas to life. I am very passionate about turning new ideas or concepts from templates into technically sound and functional websites.
ABOUT-ME.CALL-TO-ACTION: If you think I would be a good fit for your project, please contact me.

PORTFOLIO.CONTENT: Explore a selection of my work here - interact with projects to see my skill in action

PORTFOLIO.LOCO-TEXT: Jump and Run. Based on Object Oriented Programming
